content: Oh hey all here's a few simple shelves I
did and I used popsicle sticks on the side there's some stir sticks for the
shelves I made a little bit of a larger base on the tall shelf so it wouldn't
fall over the backs are solid woods rectangles that I got from just random
hobby craft wood so it's a mix of different types of wood and when I
assembled these I tend not to use hot glue as it's little can be a little
quicker but on paper and wood like this I tend to use the white glue to assemble
as the hot glue can kind of squirt out and just kind of muck up the appearance
so I tend to use the white glue on this takes a longer to dry but you get a nice
result hey guys here's the shelves I did all finished and you see I put some
items on them I've like a scroll and book and some potions I painted it up
like wood and you see I got a rectangular bottom from just some craft
wood I got the craft store and you can see the detail on the scroll just a
piece of paper I got a book on there which is the the dmg info technique the
potions are just some beads with a pin stuck through it in a dab of glue and
then cut off on the bottom snip the pin on the bottom there we got some more
books and roll up scrolls more potions so I think that detailing looks really
nice I really adds to the scale and just pay these up to look like wood and so
there are some of my shelves so Roderick what do you think of these books are
dumb but Rodrik like potions hey you yeah you back here huh I know is
short or they expect or the short tip watch longer episodes if you want Jesus
quit bugging me hey and make sure you join the forum too
much for that oh yeah and have a magical craft a sick day
